form.title: Welcome to Mwasalat !
form.subTitle: We are delighted to serve you and always strive to provide the best services.
form.description: In our efforts to improve and expand our services, we invite you to participate in our field survey to identify additional locations to better serve you.
form.subDescription: All you need to do is:

validation.phoneInvalid: Please enter a valid Omani phone number
validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address

messages.locationError: Unable to get your current location. Please check your browser permissions.
messages.geolocationNotSupported: Your browser does not support geo-location services.
messages.addressLookupFailed: Unable to get address for this location.

toast.successEmail: A confirmation email has been sent to your email address, and a verification OTP has been sent to your phone number.
toast.successDefault: Thank you for submitting your information.
toast.errorDefault: We couldn't submit your information. Please try again.

verification.title: Phone Verification

description.initial: Enter the verification code sent to your phone
description.phoneError: There was an issue verifying your phone
description.error: There was an issue verifying your email

verification.codeSent: We've sent a 4-digit verification code to:
verification.pleaseWait: Please wait while we verify your information.

toast.codeSent: We've sent a 4-digit verification code to: {{phone}}
toast.errorCodeResendDescription: Something went wrong while verifying your code. Please try again.
toast.invalidDescription: Please enter a valid 4-digit OTP code.
toast.failedDescription: The OTP code you entered is incorrect or expired. Please try again.
toast.errorDescription: Something went wrong while verifying your code. Please try again.
